readable.title: 2656987333_80dcc82c05
readable.content: A cowboy covers his head as a jumping horse tramples him . A man in a cowboy hat being stepped on by a brown horse A rider has fallen off a horse and is shielding himself from being trampled Man with white cowboy hat on the ground behind a brown horse with both front legs off the ground . Whoa ! The cowboy is underneath the hoofs of the brown horse and is getting stepped on .
